At MentoBliss, we believe in fostering mental well-being and providing a helping hand on your journey towards a healthier mind. Our app is designed to empower users to assess and manage their stress, anxiety, and depression levels through the well-established DASS-21 test. We understand the importance of mental health, and our mission is to make mental well-being accessible to everyone.
Our mission is to break down the barriers surrounding mental health by offering a user-friendly platform that promotes self-awareness, education, and support. We aim to create a community where individuals can learn about their mental health, access valuable resources, and connect with professionals who can guide them on their path to wellness.
